channel.title: ShardScape worked on for 3 months now! Ultimate server! Check it out!
channel.description:
[center][u][size=15pt]Welcome to ShardScape[/size][/u]
I have been working on this project for a few months now and have finally completed it!!
[u]Features:[/u] ~Full Range, Melee and Magic~ ~Fully working Godwars~ ~Full Castle Wars 100%~ ~Fully working Prayer~ ~Client.java only 245Kb~ ~All NEW interfaces~ ~All latest items~ ~All latest NPC's~ ~Ancients and Lunar~ ~All Skills Working 100%~
Lots of other thing im doing this really quick!.. [u] Pictures:[/u] To come soon...
[u]Download:[/u] http://uppit.com/YLTUI0 [/CENTER] ~Scrummy

item.title: ShardScape worked on for 3 months now! Ultimate server! Check it out!
item.dc:creator: @ion5005 ion5005
item.description:
@ion5005 wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:2, topic:238546”]3 months my ass?
This wouldn’t take 3 months… Plus you downloaded a source and edited. Not even good coding… = Leech.[/quote]Why are you being like this to someone? Don’t you realize your server is known as what ruined Oldkoscape, which ruined Hustlascape? Maybe it took him 3 months… because he is not on his computer all day like some people in the world. Look all I am asking is show some respect for people, even if they leech just ignore it… no point in jumping to conclusions about things. Also how would you know if it is good coding or not? Those are big words coming from someone who doesn’t program Java as good as most people. Before you post, think about it?

Read full topic
